name: Full Wedding Planning
shortDescription: Comprehensive planning from start to finish.
fullDescription: Our comprehensive wedding planning service covers every detail from start to finish, ensuring your dream wedding becomes a reality. Our experienced planners will assist with venue selection, catering, floral arrangements, photography, entertainment, and every aspect of your special day.

name: Venue Selection
fullDescription: Let us help you find the perfect venue that matches your vision, style, and budget for your special day. We have a wide range of exquisite venues to choose from, whether you dream of an elegant ballroom, a rustic barn, or a scenic beachfront setting.

name: Catering Services
shortDescription: Exquisite cuisine tailored to your preferences.
fullDescription: Delight your guests with exquisite cuisine and professional catering services tailored to your preferences. Our expert chefs will create a custom menu that reflects your tastes, from gourmet appetizers to decadent desserts.

name: Floral Arrangements
shortDescription: Elevate your wedding decor with stunning flowers.
fullDescription: Elevate your wedding decor with stunning floral arrangements and centerpieces that reflect your style. Our talented florists will work with you to choose the perfect blooms and colors to complement your theme.
benefits: Coordination with venue for floral setup

name: Photography & Videography
fullDescription: Capture every precious moment of your wedding day with our professional photography and videography services. Our skilled photographers and videographers will document your love story, from the emotional vows to the joyful celebrations.

name: Entertainment & DJ
shortDescription: Keep the party going with top-notch entertainment.
fullDescription: Ensure your guests have a blast with top-notch entertainment and DJ services to keep the party going. From live bands to skilled DJs, we'll provide the perfect musical entertainment to suit your style and preferences.

name: Wedding Decor Rentals
shortDescription: Rent exquisite decor to elevate your ambiance.
fullDescription: Elevate your wedding ambiance with our wide selection of decor rentals. From elegant table settings to stylish furniture, we have everything you need to create the perfect atmosphere for your big day.
benefits: Variety of decor themes and styles

name: Bridal Hair & Makeup
shortDescription: Look and feel your best on your special day.
fullDescription: Look and feel your best on your wedding day with our professional bridal hair and makeup services. Our skilled stylists will create a stunning bridal look that enhances your natural beauty and complements your bridal attire.
